data.name: Molten Touch
data.tooltip: Attack target and units next to it are ignited and take <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneWeapon_DebuffDamage.amount / duckiesHeroHellborneWeapon_Debuff.periodic_duration" style="Bold"/> damage per second for <d ref="duckiesHeroHellborneWeapon_Debuff.duration"/> seconds.
